mapper.insert: insert into goods set goods_id = #{goodsId},set goods_type_id=#{goodsTypeId},set goods_state_id=#{goodsStateId}, set goods_name=#{goodsName},set repertory=#{repertory},set price=#{price},set realPrice=#{realPrice},set creator_id=#{creatorId}, set create_time=#{createTime},set modifier_id=#{modifierId},set modify_time=#{modifyTime},set isDelete=#{isDelete}, set description=#{description},set logo=#{logo}
